abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the command buffer maintains strong references to the resources it uses.
overview:
## Discussion

You can configure this property when you create a command buffer by setting [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBufferDescriptor/retainedReferences] of an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBufferDescriptor] instance and calling the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandQueue/makeCommandBuffer(descriptor:)] method. The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandQueue/makeCommandBuffer()] method sets this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandQueue/makeCommandBufferWithUnretainedReferences()] sets it to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], your app is responsible for maintaining strong references to all the resources the command buffer relies on until it completes.

# retainedReferences

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the command buffer maintains strong references to the resources it uses.

## Declaration

```swift
var retainedReferences: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

You can configure this property when you create a command buffer by setting [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBufferDescriptor/retainedReferences] of an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBufferDescriptor] instance and calling the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandQueue/makeCommandBuffer(descriptor:)] method. The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandQueue/makeCommandBuffer()] method sets this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandQueue/makeCommandBufferWithUnretainedReferences()] sets it to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], your app is responsible for maintaining strong references to all the resources the command buffer relies on until it completes.
title: retainedReferences
